participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Reflective and humorous, with a deep love for creativity and self-expression.
participant_1.background: I am recovering from knee surgery and trying not to lust after the neighbour pool boy. I am a person who likes to express myself through tattoos and music. I have a busy life and tend to neglect my family, but I'm making an effort to do better. I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab. I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, always eager to inspire others to pursue their dreams.
participant_2.background: My first big purchase was my home. I realized that I have more control over my life than I thought I did. I'd love to be a pilot like my brother. I am passionate about a lot of things. I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing great, thank you!
I'm doing okay! I'm recovering from knee surgery.
Oh no! I hope you are healing well!
Yes, I am thanks! I'm just trying not to lust after the neighbour pool boy.
What are you up to today?
Not much, just getting ready for work. I'm a pilot.
Oh wow! That's amazing! I've always wanted to be a pilot!
It's a great job! I love it!
I love the feeling of being up in the air and the freedom of it all.
That sounds amazing! I bet the views are incredible too!
They are! I love seeing the world from up high.
You should look into getting your pilot's license!
